meanings.definition: (略語) 環境協力に関する太平洋経済協力会議 (Pacific Economic Cooperation Council on Environmental Cooperation)
meanings.english_definition: (abbreviation) Pacific Economic Cooperation Council on Environmental Cooperation.

examples.sentence: PECC is an organization dedicated to promoting environmental cooperation in the Asia-Pacific region.
examples.translation: PECCはアジア太平洋地域における環境協力の促進に専念する組織です。
